articles.title: Hands off: Cronk reveals why he’s taking a backseat in No.7 heir’s booming NRL career - Fox Sports
articles.description: Rugby league legend and Roosters staff member Cooper Cronk has revealed why he is keen to take a hands-off approach to helping young star Sam Walker develop into a quality NRL halfback.
